extension.description: Downloads all different kinds of artwork for TV shows and Movies in your library. Check the options for supported artwork[CR] For this to work your skins needs to support these features![CR] Remark:[CR]Each TV Show / Movie must have its own folder where an 'extrafanart' or 'extrathumbs' subfolder will be created.[CR] Artwork sources:[cCR]fanart.tv[CR]thetvdb.com)[CR]themoviedb.org[CR] Skin integration:[CR]See readme file
